divs: Sighting DetailsSaw red light blinking with 'shooting star' falling from bottom of object. Looked at red light for a few seconds. My girlfriend (who didn't care much) said we should go and we rode off on our bikes. I kept looking while riding but it disappeared.
trends: There have been 65 other sightings in Fort Collins
There were 3 other sightings in Fort Collins on or around June 13th 2009
Summary: Red light blinking with 'shooting star' which fell from bottom of object.
